item.title: GPT-4 API general availability
item.description:
GPT-4 API general availability and deprecation of older models in the Completions API. GPT-3.5 Turbo, DALLÂ·E and Whisper APIs are also generally available, and we are releasing a deprecation plan for older models of the Completions API, which will retire at the beginning of 2024.
